alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 6:54PM CDT until June 01 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Alexander County in southern Illinois... Central Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... Eastern Scott County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 654 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tamms to Anniston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tamms around 700 PM CDT. Mounds around 705 PM CDT. Wyatt around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wickliffe, Bardwell and Karnak. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 17. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 1 and 21. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 66 and 90. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
